segments.text: I am certain I am going to fail my English test .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because it's impossible to improve listening level within a week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think my vocabulary and reading comprehension are not very bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about it . Practice makes perfect . I will lend you some listening materials , so that you can practise more before the exam . I believe you can pass the exam with good preparation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , thank you . That's very nice of you .
segments.speaker: S1
